author: Carolina Ramalho
description: My idea! Using a GPS black rubber strap and electronics around it. Should he blow it the bracelet is triggered in the system that has been corrupted and the bracelet shows the location immediately that the bracelet was corrupted. This bracelet would mediate temperature to happen if the elevation of body temperature on the pattern of symptoms of ebola. After raising the temperature bracelet triggers the healthcare system to return the suspect to the hospital and make examinations of the disease. The clock would have a profile equal to the clock from Sony. Only black rubber to not have high costs.

title: Ebola Bracelet Monitors
